content:
# Get all entities and find our mining drill
entities = get_entities()
print("Looking for mining drill...")
for entity in entities:
    if entity.name == 'burner-mining-drill':
        drill = entity
        print(f"Found drill at {drill.position} with status: {drill.status}")
        print(f"Drop position: {drill.drop_position}")

# Move to position for chest placement
move_to(Position(x=-18.5, y=21.5))

# Place wooden chest at drill's output
chest = place_entity(
    Prototype.WoodenChest,
    position=Position(x=-18.5, y=21.5)
)
print(f"Placed chest at: {chest.position}")

# Verify setup
print(f"Mining drill status after adding chest: {drill.status}")
print(f"Chest inventory: {inspect_inventory(chest)}")
